snippet: Jean-Eric Vergne did his best to boost his chances of being back on the Formula One grid next year with a season's best sixth place for Toro Rosso in Singapore on Sunday despite two penalties....

headline.print_headline: Unwanted Vergne Delivers a Timely Reminder
headline.main: Unwanted Vergne Delivers a Timely Reminder

lead_paragraph: Jean-Eric Vergne did his best to boost his chances of being back on the Formula One grid next year with a season's best sixth place for Toro Rosso in Singapore on Sunday despite two penalties.
